p: Further study about the antioxidant activity from the leaves ethanolic extract has also supported the previous study [ 66]. On the one hand, the methanolic extract shows much higher antioxidant activity than its essential oils [ 67]. On the other hand, Ageratum conyzoides L. has a positive effect in the redox system when it is exposed to diabetic rats induced by streptozotocin, while increasing the glycaemic status of those rats [ 68].
